sentences.english: Since women cannot perform the duties of ancestor worship, girl children are often murdered by their parents.
sentences.chinese: 女人不能履行祭祖的职责，所以女婴常常被父母弄死。

sentences.english: The machine SuoYi while help nursing switched two girls.
sentences.chinese: 索宜趁帮助喂奶之机互换了两个女婴。

sentences.english: Steadman gave birth to a healthy baby girl earlier this month.
sentences.chinese: 史提德曼本月初生下一位健康的小女婴。

sentences.english: A cihuateteo is the restless spirit of a woman who has died in childbirth.
sentences.chinese: 恶灵是分娩时就夭折的女婴魂灵。

sentences.english: She had a normal delivery in hospital, giving birth to an apparently healthy baby girl.
sentences.chinese: 她在医院正常分娩，生下一个看似健康的女婴。

sentences.english: In 1882, a baby girl caught a fever that was so fierce she nearly died.
sentences.chinese: 一八八二年，一名女婴因发高烧差点夭折。

sentences.english: The young mother fed her baby girl with milk.
sentences.chinese: 她年轻的母亲喂母乳的女婴。

sentences.english: No identification of the girl has been found, and her parents - still missing - will be charged with abandonment.
sentences.chinese: 目前还没有办法确定女婴和她父母的身份。

sentences.english: Female infanticide and fetal resorption are active areas of study.
sentences.chinese: 杀女婴跟胚胎再吸收是现在研究的范围。

sentences.english: Your baby will begin to vocalize long before she can talk.
sentences.chinese: 你的女婴早在会说话之前就要开始咿呀发声了。

sentences.english: DNA test showed that Yin was the girl's biological father, the report said.
sentences.chinese: 报道称，DNA鉴定表明殷是女婴的亲生父亲。

sentences.english: When the crying baby grew into a girl, she became fascinated with fashion and vanity.
sentences.chinese: 当小女婴长成小女孩时，她对时尚和虚荣大为着迷。

sentences.english: British baby girl born without eyes, fake eye glasses will be installed.
sentences.chinese: 英国女婴天生没有眼睛，将安装玻璃假眼。

sentences.english: Turner syndrome (TS) affects about one in 1500 to 2500 live-born females.
sentences.chinese: 透纳氏症约占活产女婴的1500到2500分之一。

sentences.english: There were 30 baby girls and 29 baby boys.
sentences.chinese: 研究对象包括30名女婴和29个男婴。

sentences.english: C-sections are also 20 percent more common for males.
sentences.chinese: 剖宫产对于男婴的普遍性比女婴要高20%。

definition: erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
